intro: Harvest. Sell. Upgrade. Become the ultimate mushroom hunter.
description:
This is a relaxing simulation experience where forest exploration, resource gathering, and steady progression come together in a calm and rewarding gameplay loop.

Step into the role of a forest forager and mushroom hunter. Explore peaceful woodland environments, search for valuable mushrooms, and carefully harvest them using your tools. Every mushroom collected contributes to your progression and helps you improve your efficiency.

Sell the mushrooms you gather and reinvest your earnings into upgrading your equipment. Unlock and improve knives, scythes, and sickles to increase harvesting speed and effectiveness. Better tools allow you to collect more, earn more, and progress faster.

There are no timers, no pressure, and no complex mechanics - only a clear and satisfying loop focused on collection, selling, and upgrades. This makes the experience ideal for players who enjoy casual and relaxing simulator games.
